title: Lesser Beckoning
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| [![Lesser beckoning.png](/images/1/17/Lesser_beckoning.png)](/File:Lesser_beckoning.png) Lesser Beckoning |                                                                                                                                                                         |
| :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                                                     | 2                                                                                                                                                                       |
| School1                                                                                                   | [Translocation](/Translocations "Translocations")                                                                                                                       |
| Source(s)                                                                                                 | [Book of Displacement](/Book_of_Displacement "Book of Displacement") [Book of Spatial Translocations](/Book_of_Spatial_Translocations "Book of Spatial Translocations") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                               | 2                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                                 | 0                                                                                                                                                                       |
| Power Cap                                                                                                 | 50                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Range                                                                                                     | 3-5                                                                                                                                                                     |
| Flags                                                                                                     | Dir or target, Needs tracer, Not self                                                                                                                                   |

|   |                                                                              |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Beckons the target forward, attempting to place them adjacent to the caster. |

**Lesser Beckoning** pulls a single target adjacent to the caster. It won't move victims into ineligible terrain (such as [lava](/Lava "Lava")), but can move them past such terrain, and can move monsters into [traps](/Trap "Trap") or [clouds](/Cloud "Cloud"). It requires line of fire for enemies to be affected, and its range increases from 3 to 5 with [spell power](/Spell_power "Spell power").

[Warpers](/Warper "Warper") start with this spell available.

## Strategy

Lesser Beckoning is mostly useful for slow characters, such as [Nagas](/Naga "Naga"), players in [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form"), or worshippers of [Cheibriados](/Cheibriados "Cheibriados"), for pulling enemies to you so that you can hit them in melee.

At higher power levels, it is useful for all sorts of characters. It can pull enemies in, such as an annoying [centaur](/Centaur_\(monster\) "Centaur (monster)") or [deep elf](/List_of_deep_elves "List of deep elves"). This helps you kill them before taking loads of ranged attacks.

## History

- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), Lesser Beckoning was a level 3 spell. It had a power cap of 100 and minimum range of only 2.
- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), the spell had a power cap of 200. The maximum range was reduced from 7 to 5.
- Added in [0.19](/0.19 "0.19").
html:
Lesser Beckoning

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
 Lesser Beckoning
Level 2
School1 Translocation
Source(s) Book of Displacement
Book of Spatial Translocations
Casting noise 2
Spell noise 0
Power Cap 50
Range 3-5
Flags Dir or target, Needs tracer, Not self
Beckons the target forward, attempting to place them adjacent to the caster.

Lesser Beckoning pulls a single target adjacent to the caster. It won't move victims into ineligible terrain (such as lava), but can move them past such terrain, and can move monsters into traps or clouds. It requires line of fire for enemies to be affected, and its range increases from 3 to 5 with spell power.

Warpers start with this spell available.

Strategy

Lesser Beckoning is mostly useful for slow characters, such as Nagas, players in Statue Form, or worshippers of Cheibriados, for pulling enemies to you so that you can hit them in melee.

At higher power levels, it is useful for all sorts of characters. It can pull enemies in, such as an annoying centaur or deep elf. This helps you kill them before taking loads of ranged attacks.

History

  • Prior to 0.30, Lesser Beckoning was a level 3 spell. It had a power cap of 100 and minimum range of only 2.
  • Prior to 0.28, the spell had a power cap of 200. The maximum range was reduced from 7 to 5.
  • Added in 0.19.

rawPage:
{{version031}}
{{spell info}}

'''Lesser Beckoning''' pulls a single target adjacent to the caster. It won't move victims into ineligible terrain (such as [[lava]]), but can
move them past such terrain, and can move monsters into [[trap]]s or [[cloud]]s. It requires line of fire for enemies to be affected, and its range increases from 3 to 5 with [[spell power]].

[[Warper]]s start with this spell available.

==Strategy==
Lesser Beckoning is mostly useful for slow characters, such as [[Naga]]s, players in [[Statue Form]], or worshippers of [[Cheibriados]], for pulling enemies to you so that you can hit them in melee. 

At higher power levels, it is useful for all sorts of characters. It can pull enemies in, such as an annoying [[centaur (monster)|centaur]] or [[list of deep elves|deep elf]]. This helps you kill them before taking loads of ranged attacks.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.30]], Lesser Beckoning was a level 3 spell. It had a power cap of 100 and minimum range of only 2.
*Prior to [[0.28]], the spell had a power cap of 200. The maximum range was reduced from 7 to 5.
*Added in [[0.19]].
